page.title: 09 Education.
page.content: {Prestbury C/E.Aided Primary}School. Prestbury School stands in 4 acres of land and has about 310 children on roll.Bollin Grove is the site of the Junior School and it has an Infant department on Dale Brow.There is a Nursery which has 50 children a day,25 before lunch and 25 after. We do maths,writing,art and P.E. including outside and inside games,a rounders team, football and netball teams and swimming.We also do spelling,science,country dancing and music.Different teachers take us for wind,brass and string instruments.We also have an orchestra. We have an end of term holiday, a half term holiday and six weeks in July and August. I think we ought to have a choir and lessons outside.
